sentence.Network_en: The Son is consubstantial with the Father.
Is that then the divine substance wherein Father and Son are consubstantial?
sentence.Network_cn: 永远的法则与天主共存.那么,这就是圣父与圣子同体的那个神圣的实体 吗 ?
我那同体的父亲的声音.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(C5) - 商务英语词汇 ... constructor 构造函数 consubstantial 同质的 consuetude 习俗.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... consubstantialism 圣体合质论 consubstantiality 同体 consubstantiate 使成同体.
consubstantiality 同体consubstantiate 使成同体consubstantiation 圣体共在论
The Son is consubstantial with the Father ., 圣子与圣父同体.
路德反对慈运格理(Zwingli),他主张照字句解释;在举行圣餐的时候,主耶稣乃与圣物同时临在,所以乃倡圣体共在论(Consubstantiation)代替变体说。此说由渥肯氏(Oceam).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from ecclesiastical Latin consubstantialis (translating Greek homoousios 'of one substance'), from con- 'with' + substantialis (see substantial)

means.word_mean: 1. regarded as the same in substance or essence (as of the three persons of the Trinity)

auth_sentence.content: There are bits of the translation that people are simply not happy with, words such as consubstantial' in the Creed.
